modmenu.descriptionTranslation.betteranv: Quick renaming of CIT, CEM and CMD items from resource packs in anvil and chat!

better_anvil.favorite.title: Favorite

better_anvil.no_cloth_config.title: Download the Cloth Config mod to open Better Anvil config menu.
better_anvil.selection_gui.title: Select an available resource pack items category:
better_anvil.pack_button.disable: There are no any enabled resource packs.
better_anvil.cit_button.disable: There is no any item in the anvil.
better_anvil.cem_button.disable: There is no Name Tag item in the anvil.
better_anvil.mod_menu.view_resource_pack: Enable view resource pack in the resource pack selection screen.
better_anvil.mod_menu.cmd_support.toolti: Enable support Custom Model Data items from resource packs.
better_anvil.mod_menu.cit_support.toolti: Enable support Custom Item Texture items from resource packs.
better_anvil.mod_menu.menu_buttons.toolt: The location of Better Anvil buttons in the Anvil GUI.
better_anvil.mod_menu.overwriting.reload: Overwrite configs on reload resource packs.
better_anvil.mod_menu.overwriting.checkb: Overwrite only if the checkbox is checked in the resource pack selection screen.
better_anvil.mod_menu.cit_menu.renames_e: How many CIT Item renames will be shown in the CIT menu.
better_anvil.mod_menu.cit_menu.renames_i: Use it if you selected renames count to 'Custom'.
better_anvil.pack_menu.checkbox.tooltip: Overwrite configs for enabled resource packs [Better Anvil].
better_anvil.mod_menu.overwriting.toolti: Choose when configs should be overwritten.
better_anvil.mod_menu.gui.dark_mode.tool: Enable Dark Mode for Better Anvil.
better_anvil.mod_menu.gui.rename_button_: Spacing between Rename Buttons in CIT and CMD menu.
